title: India’s newly launched SSLV -D1 failed
dc:creator: Huzaifa Mustafa
description:
First I will try to explain the Mission objectives then I will explain why this mission failed. I will request you to keep reading till the last word to get the idea. You’re quite wondering what is SSLV. Meanwhile, you’re also appreciating India for its advancement in the field of science and technology. So without wasting our time we move toward that what is SSLV? SSLV stands for Small Satellite Launch Vehicle. The Small Satellite Launch Vehicle (SSLV) is a small-lift launch vehicle developed by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) with a payload capacity to deliver 500 kg (1,100
